00049 TapTempoCalculator* TapTempoCalculator::getInstance() {
00050 
00051     if ( 0 == _instance ) {
00052 
00053         _instance = new TapTempoCalculator();
00054     }
00055 
00056     return _instance;
00057 }

00073 //
00074 // INTERFACE
00075 //
00077 void TapTempoCalculator::process() {
00078 
00079     // the last timestamp will be 0 on first call of this function
00080     static int lastStamp = 0;
00081 
00082     // get pointer to document
00083     Document* pDocument = Document::getInstance();
00084 
00085     // get current timestamp
00086     int currentStamp = _timeStamper.getStamp();
00087 
00088     // store delta between current timestamp and last one
00089     _deltas.push_back( currentStamp - lastStamp );
00090     _deltas.pop_front();
00091 
00092     // are deltas steady ?
00093     pDocument->setTempoFromTap(true);
00094     pDocument->setSteady(getSteadiness());
00095 
00096     // set tempo according to average
00097     double averageDelta = getAverageDelta();
00098     pDocument->setTempo(
00099             static_cast<int>(Constants::SECONDS_PER_MINUTE * Constants::MILLISEC_PER_SECOND / averageDelta));
00100 
00101     // store current stamp for next call
00102     lastStamp = currentStamp;
00103 }
00104 
00105 
00106 
00108 //
00109 // PRIVATE FUNCTIONS
00110 //
00112 void TapTempoCalculator::initDeltas() {
00113 
00114     for ( int i=0; i<DELTAS_COUNT; i++ ) {
00115 
00116         _deltas.push_back(0);
00117     }
00118 }
00119 
00120 
00121 
00122 double TapTempoCalculator::getAverageDelta() const {
00123 
00124     list<int>::const_iterator it = _deltas.begin();
00125     long sum = 0;
00126 
00127     while ( it != _deltas.end() ) {
00128 
00129         sum += *it;
00130         it++;
00131     }
00132 
00133     return static_cast<double>(sum)/DELTAS_COUNT;
00134 }
00135 
00136 
00137 
00138 
00139 bool TapTempoCalculator::getSteadiness() const {
00140 
00141     /*
00142      * we get the minimum delta, the maximum and return true if they're
00143      * enclosed withing a range expressed as a ratio. STEADY_RATIO
00144      */
00145     static const double STEADY_RATIO = 0.90;
00146 
00147     list<int>::const_iterator begin = _deltas.begin();
00148     list<int>::const_iterator end = _deltas.end();
00149 
00150     list<int>::const_iterator min = min_element(begin, end);
00151     list<int>::const_iterator max = max_element(begin, end);
00152 
00153     return ( (static_cast<double>(*min) / *max) > STEADY_RATIO );
00154 }
